details:
[15-Apr-2025 19:29:08 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE wp_egwp_telegram_post_chats ( id int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar(256) NOT NULL, chat_id varchar(256) NOT NULL, created_at datetime default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, deleted_at datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY id (id) )

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
